DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare attributable procedural time Endobronchial Ultrasound - Transbronchial Needle Aspiration ( EBUS-TBNA ) sample mediastinal hilar lymph node without Rapid On-Site Evaluation ( ROSE ) . The primary outcome time elapse EBUS bronchoscope insertion bronchoscope withdrawal . Secondary outcome include total number sample lymph node , average number needle aspiration per lymph node sample , overall diagnostic yield , procedural time cytopathologist .
DOC.brief_title: Procedural Outcomes Endobronchial Ultrasound - Transbronchial Needle Aspiration ( EBUS-TBNA ) With Without Rapid On-Site Evaluation ( ROSE )
